sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.LFExceptionMapper</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Maps all LF specific errors to its corresponding message and status code and throws the exception.</description> <name>LFExceptionMapper</name> <script><![CDATA[var LFExceptionMapper = Class.create(); LFExceptionMapper.prototype = {
exceptionsMapper: { "INVALID_ARTIFACT": [40001, gs.getMessage("Artifact configuration name field is missing or invalid.")], "SYS_ID_FIELD_MISS": [40002, gs.getMessage("SysId field is missing or invalid.")], "TARGET_LANGUAGE_FIELD_MISS": [40003, gs.getMessage("Target language field is missing or invalid.")], "SOURCE_LANGUAGE_FIELD_MISS": [40004, gs.getMessage("Source language field is missing or invalid.")], "INVALID_ADDITIONAL_INFO": [40005, gs.getMessage("Additional parameters are invalid.")], "SAME_SOURCE_AND_TARGET_LANGUAGE": [40006, gs.getMessage("Target language cannot be same as source language.")], "INVALID_OVERRIDE_EXISTING_TRANSLATIONS_PARAMETER": [40007, gs.getMessage("Override existing translations field is invalid.")], "INVALID_FILE_TYPE_FIELD": [40008, gs.getMessage("File type field is missing or invalid.")], "INVALID_FILE_CONTENT": [40009, gs.getMessage("Imported file content is invalid.")], "REQUESTED_ITEM_IDS_FIELD_INVALID": [40010, gs.getMessage("Requested Item IDs field is missing or invalid.")], "DT_PLUGIN_NOT_INSTALLED": [40011, gs.getMessage("Dynamic Translation plugin is not installed.")], "UNSUPPORTED_EMAIL_FILE_FORMAT": [40012, gs.getMessage("Email File Format {0} is not supported.")], "INVALID_EMAIL_ID_IN_RECIPIENTS_LIST": [40013, gs.getMessage("Default recipients list contains an invalid email id.")], "UNSUPPORTED_EXPORT_IMPORT_FILE_FORMAT": [40014, gs.getMessage("Export Import File Format {0} is not supported.")], "INVALID_WORKFLOW": [40015, gs.getMessage("Workflow {0} is invalid.")], "UNSUPPORTED_AUTO_TRANSLATION_MODE": [40016, gs.getMessage("Auto Translation Mode {0} is not supported.")], "AUTO_TRANSLATION_MODE_NOT_CONFIGURED": [40017, gs.getMessage("Auto Translation Mode {0} is not configured.")], "UNSUPPORTED_TRANSLATION_MODE": [40018, gs.getMessage("Unsupported translation mode.")], "UNSUPPORTED_TRANSLATION_ACTION": [40019, gs.getMessage("Unsupported translation action.")], "INVALID_ARTIFACT_DETAILS": [40020, gs.getMessage("Artifact details are invalid.")], "LOCALIZATION_FRAMEWORK_HUB_PLUGIN_NOT_INSTALLED": [40021, gs.getMessage("Localization Framework Hub plugin is not installed.")],
"ARTIFACT_DOES_NOT_EXIST": [40051, gs.getMessage("{0} Artifact configuration does not exist.")], "INACTIVE_ARTIFACT": [40052, gs.getMessage("{0} Artifact configuration is inactive.")], "INVALID_SYS_ID": [40053, gs.getMessage("SysId is missing or invalid.")], "INVALID_TARGET_LANGUAGE": [40054, gs.getMessage("Target language is missing or invalid.")], "SETTING_DOESNOT_EXIST": [40055, gs.getMessage("Target language does not have localization setting.")], "INVALID_SOURCE_LANGUAGE": [40056, gs.getMessage("Source language is missing or invalid.")], "TASK_CREATION_FAILED": [40057, gs.getMessage("Task creation failed for sys id {0}, source language {1} and target language {2}.")], "MACHINE_TRANSLATION_DISABLED": [40058, gs.getMessage("Machine translation is not enabled for {0}.")], "MACHINE_TRANSLATION_FAILED": [40059, "{0}"], "READ_SCRIPT_ERROR": [40060, gs.getMessage("Failed to run the read script.")], "EXPORT_IMPORT_DISABLED": [40061, gs.getMessage("Export import is not enabled for {0}.")], "INVALID_FILE_TYPE": [40062, gs.getMessage("File type is invalid.")], "NO_TRANSLATIONS_IN_IMPORTED_FILE": [40063, gs.getMessage("Imported file has no translations.")], "INSUFFICIENT_ROLE": [40064, gs.getMessage("User does not have role {0}.")], "PUBLISH_TASK_FAILED": [40065, gs.getMessage("Failed to publish localization task.")], "REQUESTED_ITEM_CREATION_FAILED": [40066, gs.getMessage("Failed to create requested item for sys id {0}, source language {1}, and target language {2}.")], "INVALID_REQUESTED_ITEM_IDS": [40067, gs.getMessage("One or more requested items are missing or invalid.")], "INVALID_TMS_NAME": [40068, gs.getMessage("TMS {0} is not valid.")], "INVALID_EMAIL_SUBFLOW_NAME": [40069, gs.getMessage("Email Subflow {0} is invalid.")], "INVALID_TRANSLATION_FULFILLER_GROUP": [40070, gs.getMessage("Translation fulfiller group is invalid.")], "INVALID_TRANSLATION_APPROVER_GROUP": [40071, gs.getMessage("Translation approver group is invalid.")], "INVALID_BUSINESS_APPROVER_GROUP": [40072, gs.getMessage("Business approver group is invalid.")], "REQUESTED_ITEM_IDS_NOT_IN_SAME_PROJECT": [40073, gs.getMessage("One or more requested items do not belong to the same project.")], "REQUESTED_ITEM_IDS_DO_NOT_BELONG_TO_PROJECT": [40074, gs.getMessage("One or more requested items do not belong to any project.")], "INVALID_TASK_ID": [40075, gs.getMessage("Task does not exist for {0}.")],
"INVALID_GROUP_NAME": [40101, gs.getMessage("Group name is missing or invalid.")], "INVALID_LABEL": [40102, gs.getMessage("Label is missing or invalid.")], "INVALID_FIELDS": [40103, gs.getMessage("Field(s) is missing or invalid.")], "INVALID_TEXT_TYPE": [40104, gs.getMessage("Text type value is missing or invalid.")], "INVALID_IS_FIELD_LOCKED": [40105, gs.getMessage("Is field locked value is missing or invalid.")], "INVALID_ESCAPE_DETAILS": [40106, gs.getMessage("Escape details are missing or invalid.")], "INVALID_ELEMENT": [40107, gs.getMessage("Element is missing or invalid.")], "DUPLICATE_ELEMENT": [40108, gs.getMessage("GroupName {0} and label {1} already present, groupName and label combination should be unique.")], "INVALID_SCRIPT_INCLUDE": [40109, gs.getMessage("{0} should inherit LFArtifactProcessorSNC.")], "INVALID_SCOPE_SYS_ID": [40110, gs.getMessage("Scope sysId is missing or invalid.")], "INVALID_SHOULD_HONOUR_SCOPE": [40111, gs.getMessage("ShouldHonourScope field is missing or invalid.")] },
initialize: function(exceptionType, placeholders) { this.exceptionData = this.exceptionsMapper[exceptionType]; this.placeholders = placeholders; },
getCode: function() { return this.exceptionData[0]; },
getMessage: function() { return GlideSysMessage.formatEscaped(this.exceptionData[1], this.placeholders); },
throwException: function() { throw new LFException(this.getMessage(), this.getCode()); },
type: 'LFExceptionMapper' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-01-22 20:05:25</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1b42b0bec3b92010456b91f58640dd86</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>LFExceptionMapper</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Localization Framework" source="com.glide.localization_framework">a4dd193447720210cd4e1ce4316d4312</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1b42b0bec3b92010456b91f58640dd86</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-09-05 19:06:36</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
